intro:
Toss coins and explore the mysteries of Ancient Egypt!
The pharaoh's golden riches await you!
description:
Knock down coins one after another and obtain the treasures of the gods.
Don't miss out when gold rains down!
Share Joy-Con™, and up to 4 family members or friends can join in!

[Score Attack]
Earn as many coins as possible within the time limit and aim for a high spot on the leaderboards!
Play solo or multiplayer!

[Endless]
Play for as long as you like without a time limit!
Your coin count will persist between tries!

[Ranking]
Earn a rank for both Score Attack and Endless modes!
Compete for the highest coin count with players worldwide!

[Online]
Score Attack is also available in Online Mode!
Work together, and the treasure will be yours!

Play together with up to 4 players!
Alone or together, aim for your next high score!
